name: Hercules (itch) (Stickman2777)
description:
Made in 8 days for the historically accurate game jam. Slam attacks have more stun time than regular attacks, sorry about the bossy being a bit glitchy. Sometimes a regular attack will be critical and be bigger.

Ground and background made by craftpix.net

Music composed by an ancient Athenian band entitled Deamonia Nymphe
